name: Drunk On Nectar - The Nature Simulator
description: Nature, Survival, Lifecycles: Experience the incredible life of animals & their unique life stories; Drunk On Nectar aspires to become the most comprehensive nature experience ever made.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 3 Ghz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 2 GB VRAM, min DirectX10 necessary. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
